metadata.description: 'A believing heart is your magic!' Those words changed young Atsuko 'Akko' Kagari's forever, sparking in her a life-long dream of becoming a real witch. Now, she's been accepted to the same school as her childhood hero Shiny Chariot, the prestigious Luna Nova Witchcraft Academy-as its only non-magical student! Atsuko might be surrounded by prodigies from around the world, but giving up isn't in her vocabulary. Whether it's making friends, proving the doubters wrong, or just flying a broom, Atsuko's going to make her fantasy a reality!
metadata.name: Little Witch Academia
